column5: Hi All,  I'm very impressed with myself, managed to get this guy, definitely a PB for me....only thing is its a PB smallest ever that was not snagged or coughed up by a pike....lol.  I cannot believe how aggressive this little guy was. I was out the front of the house on a supper mission(got some bigger for supper BTW) and was getting lots of 14-15" fish on the screen and biting .  This little guy shows on the screen of my fishfinder...now anyone who has a LCD fishfinder on the ice wil know the scenario of the line making a sharp almost vertical run at your bait meaning GET READY TO SET THE HOOK...THIS GUY MEANS BUSINESS!  He smacked it, actually felt the bite...lol....could feel it 'fluttering' on the way up but just thought it was my minnow as i had it hooked through the back at the dorsal fin.....lol...after a titanic struggle lasting 0.1 seconds i iced my PB smallest walleye ever.  The minnow that was nearly as big as the fish was halfway down its throat, the hook not even in its mouth, which was good as that enabled me to let it go relatively unharmed. I really hope to meet up with that guy again some day 10 years from now, especially if he maintains that feisty attitude.   WHAT A BEAUTY! TONS OF ATTITUDE IN A LITTLE BODY
You had me there for a second.  Congrat's on the catch.
If there is such thing as a cute walleye, that is definitely it.  Nice one.
Time for a replica mount!
Good thread Simon. No hard feelings Simon but may all of your entries for Team 5 be that massive.
Nice.. thats awesome looking!!
thats awesome, I hope one day I can catch one like that!
hope that big guy didnt strain your arms tooooooooooooo bad now!   lol
Looks like a baby sauger!!  Shame you had to put it back..  Would be fun to have one in the fish tank!  kewl HD
"DISAPPOINTED!"
Although it would be bad for the fish, it would definitley e a sweet addition to a fish tank
I caught a Laker that size once.
They are cute that size,  here's my smallest sauger     Just noticed my triple chin.  They're all gone now since I dropped 37lbs.
What, no video footage?!?  Oh...probably too much bleeping...I understand    Gotta love the PBS fishes
i was drawn in by the "PB WALLEYE" part..... lol it is a funny little one though. during the summer i got a number of fiesty little ones.
way to go Simon ... LOL with that thread title you're going to get a lot of views on this one
Ok im lost here..what is PB? I will no doubt regret asking
Personal Best.
I dunno  ...kinda looks a little bit like an Atlantic to me
It certainly has all the characteristics of a sauger..... Ya shouldn't be using those as bait.... It's illegal Jut kidding Simon     Congrats on your SPB Nice job!!! Jacques
That is actually a 12 pound eye.  Simon has very big hands.  Congrats on the PB
As cute as a little pike.
VERTICAL HOLD ON THAT PIKE!!!!
